data.name: LineNumberingProperties
desc: provides access to the settings of the line numbering.

properties.name: CharStyleName
desc: The name of the character style that is used for the line number.

properties.name: CountEmptyLines
desc: If TRUE, empty lines are counted.

properties.name: CountLinesInFrames
desc: If TRUE, lines in frames are included in counting.

properties.name: Distance
desc: specifies the distance between the line number and the start or end of the text area.

properties.name: Interval
desc: Line numbers are shown on every Intervalth line.

properties.name: IsOn
desc: If TRUE, line numbering is used.

properties.name: NumberPosition
desc: specifies the position of the line number (constant LineNumberPositions left/right/inside/outside).

properties.name: NumberingType
desc: specifies the type of the numbering.

properties.name: RestartAtEachPage
desc: specifies if the line numbering should start from the beginning at each page.
If set to FALSE the line numbering will be continuous.

properties.name: SeparatorInterval
desc: The line separator is shown every SeparatorIntervalth line.

properties.name: SeparatorText
desc: specifies the string that is used for the line separator.
